content: Hi everyone! I'm mendess and I love Rust, I'm at the end of my studies but I hope I can find a job using Rust at, least partially, soon! I joined because I want to try and help stabilize const generics and would appreciate some pointers. I have contributed a bit in the past but I want to try to get more involved!

Hi @Pedro Mendes , work on const generics is mostly done in the #project-const-generics stream.

Feel free to join us there if you are interested
there aren't too many good issues rn as we are currently blocked on some fairly complex changes

you might want to look into https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/260443-project-const-generics/topic/resolve.20hack.20help.20msg.3A.20.60const_generics.60/near/217554337 if you are interested
